pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, April 5, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Scarborough, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit Toronto Community Housingâ€™s Adanac Apartments, and make an affordable housing announcement with Mayor of Toronto John Tory. A media availability will follow. Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Jean-Yves Duclos, Minister of Border Security and Organized Crime Reduction Bill Blair and Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Adam Vaughan will be in attendance.

Adanac Apartments
140 Adanac Drive

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for visit
  • Open coverage for announcement and media availability
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.
